explains: n. 轴，轴线；对称中心线，对称轴；（国家间的）联盟；斑鹿（=chital，复数axis）
wordGroup: central axis 中心轴；中央轴
major axis 长轴；主轴；长径；强轴
coordinate axis 坐标轴；座标轴
axis of evil 邪恶轴心
axis of rotation 旋转轴；转动轴
minor axis 短轴；短径；弱轴
optic axis n. 光轴，眼轴；视轴

sentences.en: The earth revolves on its axis.
sentences.cn: 地球环绕自身的轴心转动。

sentences.en: The third axis is the longitudinal axis.
Precession, basically is the change in the direction of earth's axis of rotation.
sentences.cn: 岁差，基本上是地球自转轴方向的改变。
